website_summaries.verdict: The Galaxy Player 3.6 costs $50 less than the Apple iPod Touch, but it's easy to see where Samsung cut corners.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Player 3.6 offers most of the capabilities of Samsung's popular Android smartphones, minus the phone and monthly fees
cons: Screen quality is subpar and the camera is lackluster

customer_reviews.title: Simple with outdated technology, but still works well
customer_reviews.text: Sure, it is old and only runs Android 2.3, but if you are just looking for a device to play music and movies and run some simple Wifi enabled apps this is all you need. Add a 32GB microSD card and you can have a Samsung quality 40GB media player for about $120, Who needs a fancy Android 4.x device when you really just want to listen to music, watch movies and check the weather and Google maps? It is also small enough to fit in a normal pocket, which is untrue for many of the monstrous "mobile" devices they make these days. Do you really need something with a 5" screen with you all the time?
customer_reviews.author: Readersaurus

customer_reviews.title: Okay player
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement after my iPod touch died. I know, I know, they can't die, they can't be virused (even though there is evidence to the contrary). I didn't want to spend the hundred of dollars to get a new iPod. While this is a good player, and I like it, here's my review. Pros: -Music plays well. -Video isn't bad. -Size makes it convenient to carry around. -You can have up to 32 extra GBs if you place a microsd card in it. Cons: -Battery life sucks. Lasts only about 3 hours. -The small size does make this not good for playing games.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 3.6 Galaxy Player
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds are wonderful. A random thing I really like about it is how the headphone jack practically locks into the mp3 player. if you are a habitual dropper like me then you can see the awesomeness of this. And the battery life is surprisingly great too. I can listen to from when I wake up (about 9 a.m.) and won't turn it off until 10 p.m. then I won't turn it off or charge it that night and when I play it again the next morning, I'll still have at least 50% battery left. But I usually don't have the WiFi on. I haven't taken pictures with it so I can't comment on the quality. Overall, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Little Touchy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this player as a replacement for anoter brand that gave me a problem mainly as a music player in my car. The unit has given some problems as a simple music player. For some reason the thing goes back to the desktop and the music has to be restarted. This seems to only happen once but that is still one time to many in my opinion. Once restarted things go just fine. Also as a music player the battery life is to short with under two hours play time. Really was just not the item that I was looking for. Maybe just to many other functions other than playing music.
customer_reviews.author: Allen E. Unruh

customer_reviews.title: Great Product So Far!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this from Amazon today. It Was fairly easy to set up with my home wi fi connection. Had to register my google account and then was off and running. Sound quality is really great. I bought this mainly to listen to internet radio. But this device does so much more. Haven't gotten into all that it can do but what I have done so far with it has been great for me. Amazon also did an exeptional job by sending it in one day with FREE shipping. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: pkscomix

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Rock's. THIS is a great touch screen MP3
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Daughter who turned 10 years old today. She has previously destroyed a tablet and a HTC Windows phone so I really was hesitant to make an expensive purchase again. When I started looking at touch screen MP3's I knew that I wanted a name brand (besides APPLE). I first was hesitant because it is a refurbished product. Just the ideas that it had been fixed for whatever reason didn't sit well with me, but after comparing prices and products I know that this was the best decision. This is perfect for her. It's even great for us adults. It has everything my S5 has but in a smaller version. Samsung rock's.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to handle. My daughter loves it. This is actually incredible purchase for the price. So much BANG for the buck. It has a talking gps, so easy to download songs, videos and pictures to this player. Being wi-fi capable there are many things you can do. It is texting capable using downloadable apps which is a dream come true for a pre teen. We did a google video chat using this device. Works beautifully. the picture quality and sound are impeccable. On the whole a simply great gift.!!!
customer_reviews.author: pg

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I've had to buy two of these and they have both been mediocre. The headphone jack on the first one quit working a few weeks after I got it and the second one seems to constantly be on speaker. Apparently, even with my headphones in, the sound is incredible loud and plenty of people can hear it. I had issues with freezing every now and then on both. I give up with this brand. Neither one were worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon McKinney

customer_reviews.title: the best mp3 player
customer_reviews.text: this unit is the best mp3 player i have seen so far including the ipod touch. the ability to replace the battery is a definite plus. inserting micro sdhc is a breeze. it is also an excellent e-reader if you download the kindle app. use google voice and you can make phone call for free too. best of all, you don't have to deal with itune anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rubin Pham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to replace my first generation iPod Touch. For about half the price, this thing rocks. It has all the features the Touch would, and the earbuds that come with this thing are amazing. I listen to a lot of techno and dubstep and the bass that things have is incredible. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for an iPod Touch because it can do the same things and is muuuuuuch cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Spitfish

customer_reviews.title: ... that doesn't store music on her phone or iPod like I do
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift for my wife that doesn't store music on her phone or iPod like I do. She loves the ease of use and how she can still get emails and other notifications on it like her phone. She only wishes there was a was to shuffle or sort songs to her liking. We haven't figured out a way to do that yet.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Good build quality, battery lasts a long time between charges, lots of apps. Must get the Rearth Ringke Case Shell Skin Glove Cover for good protection and to get a firm grip on the player. 3.6 is just the right size for my needs. Anyone have issues playing audio via bluetooth ? My 2011 Hyundai Sonata shows paired and connected, but wont play audio. The Galaxy will play on other devices via BT so this is has me puzzled.
customer_reviews.author: Simpleton

customer_reviews.title: MP3 awesomeness.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3.6 Samsung galaxy mp3 for music and the apps. I am loving it so far. I have only had it 3 or 4 days now and its awesome so far. I've watched a movie and the sound is great. Everything on the screen is nice and clear to me. I added a 32gb chip and no problem. So far so good. I have a samsung galaxy s3 phone and a Samsung galaxy 3 7.0 lite. Those are awesome so I knew this mp3 just had to be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: At the refurbished price this is a breathtaking value.  Fabulously designed unit. LIKE NEW.
customer_reviews.text: At the refurbished price this is a breathtaking value. Fabulously designed unit. LIKE NEW. Compared to 2014 electronics it is a bit of an electricity hog with the wifi on...about 2 hrs, mas - but at this refurb price it is an amazing tool for my continuous web-surfing and mp3 playing. Utterly amazing. And it is indistinguishable from BRAND NEW. Well done, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Loving

customer_reviews.title: More of the Same
customer_reviews.text: I've experienced much of what the other reviewers were ragging on about. The thing is under-powered and a shoddy morph of the Galaxy S into an Android branded dimly lit clock, that is, if you want to make any use of it at all considering the short battery life. I went the refurbished route, and the damn thing bricked itself five months in. Just go for an unlocked phone to meet your mp3 needs, or Cowon if you're in it purely for the sound. Best of luck browsers. Edit: If you're still interested in buying, go with BigOutlet. They were quick to respond to my issue and replaced the broken device without question. Still have faith in refurbishment.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Works for about 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a year ago and the problems with it are really wearing on me. I don't recommend buying this device. Here's a list: 1. Shuts off whenever it wants to. 2. For no reason at all, it wouldn't charge/usb to pc/turn on for 3 days. 3. Problems with the sdCard as far as mounting/unmounting 4. Slow to respond at times. 5. Doesn't offer much customization as far as the OS. The list really goes on but I'm not gonna sit here and trash it. You get the gist. This was the first "smart" device I bought. I loathe Apple so I dunno what I'm gonna do but seriously, spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: BradyistheGoat

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: I can understand why they have discontinued this device. The operating system is very unstable. I have had this device in for repair 3 times all related to the operating system. At first the battery wouldn't stay charged. Then the USB port broke, Now it just shuts off and restarts whenever it feels like it. When it works it works great. No issues with wireless connectivity. Audio plays well and sounds pretty good for an MP3. It's just all of the other glitches that are driving me crazy. For the cost of this unit it shouldn't be this much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Alan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new MP3 Player for my daughter, she had a Sansa, and we didn't want an iPod. This player is awesome, to bad Samsung isn't making them anymore. Android operating system, clean design, simple to use. Lots of storage space with added micro sd card. runs Android apps, fruit ninja, anger birds etc. Great value and price compared to Apple. Better construction then the Sansa. i bought two more because they are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great alternative to the overpriced iPod touch players. In addition to doing pretty much everything an iPod touch does, it has an FM radio on it and has wifi and great battery life. On top of all of this, Google apps can be downloaded and utilized just like on a cell phone. The speaker function sounds really nice and clear too. All in all its a good deal on a good player.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Competes strongly with iPod!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that was like an iPod touch but without the hefty price tag that comes with it. I stumbled across the Samsung Galaxy Players and couldn't believe that somebody was competing against the iPod touch so well. I am completely satisfied with this product and would dare to say that I will never be an iPod man but always and forever a Galaxy Player man form now on!
customer_reviews.author: SlyCooper

customer_reviews.title: Great Player
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am pleased with my player. It's a little ruff around the edges and Samsung has stopped providing support for this player. Happy I purchased. Pros Excellent battery life (Mostly listen to radio) FM Radio Easily Syncs with computer Cons Stuck on Gingerbread
customer_reviews.author: Tracy T

customer_reviews.title: Great product but came with scratches
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, I can put some apps in it, and have it for music so I don't have to use my galaxy phone when working out and drain the battery. This is exactly What I was looking for. I did not think the $250.00 price for a new one was worthy it because you can get an iPod for that, especially since its now discontinued. I decided then to go for the refurbished, I have not had problems, however my idea of refurbished is not that I was buying an used item. I was disappointed when I notice scratched and light paint peeling off the back.
customer_reviews.author: Drika_Emma

customer_reviews.title: I love it...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for myself so that I have so music to listen to while Im at work. I can listen to my music for up two days before I have charge it again. But when I had wi-fi on then it needed to be charged nightly. But other then that... it looks good pictures looks good and sharp, its light weight and thin. For me... it was a great buy Im very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Regarcia369

customer_reviews.title: The Best MP3 Player in the World
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Galaxy Player 3.6 is a very good mp3 player. It has a slot to put in the memory card to increase the storage capacity and I am an extra storage space person. You can put music, video, etc on a memory card and do not have to worry about not having enough space in the player. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these in September for my teenage daughter's birthday. She loved it. 6 months later, my younger daughter was running with it, fell down, and the whole thing shattered. I went back to Amazon to replace it, but the price for the exact same model had increased significantly, so I took a chance on a refurbished one this time. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sscowan

customer_reviews.title: Great little MP3 for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a fanstatic find. Does exactly what I need it to do. Love the fact that it is WiFi capable. Has 4G memory and I added a 16G chip in the back, so plenty of storage. I run it all day on Pandora. Battery last a full day streaming internet. Great price on this little gem, and this supplier shipped it quickly and as described. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Chewbaka

customer_reviews.title: Nice device for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase, which is effectively a smart phone minus the phone portion. For a very reasonable price, Samsung offers an MP3 and media player, full access to the Android apps store, built in GPS and mapping, Internet access, and e-mail. Screen resolution isn't great, but is perfectly satisfactory for the size of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Texas

customer_reviews.title: excellent iPod Touch competitor for half the price
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Galaxy Player 3.6 plus the cost of a 32 GB microSD card is literally half the price of the 32GB iPod Touch, as of the time of writing. While it doesn't run the latest version of Android, if you just need a device for the basics (music storage, podcasts, some email / web-surfing) this device is more than sufficient and a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: A crying shame Samsung discontinued the Galaxy player
customer_reviews.text: These players are great. I have the 4.2" and my wife and daughter both have 3.6" models. We all absolutely love our Galaxy Players. The best d*mn MP3 player I've ever owned. Much better than the iPod touch I once had. I've had mine for 2 years and I've never had any issues with it. Great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Furman

customer_reviews.title: it came packaged nicely. I did not have to even replace original ...
customer_reviews.text: i have owned this player for 4 years now and there has never been a single problem with mine. I bought it refurbished, it came packaged nicely. I did not have to even replace original battery until I had it 3 years. I have steadily upgraded the SD card to a 32gb and as said, it has never given me a problem. My 8 yr old daughter plays games on it as well. I take good care of it and thus far it is working as great as it did the day I took it out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: maria e dowd

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 3.6" Galaxy Player
customer_reviews.text: Although this player has been discontinued by Samsung I think it still deserves a rating. I enjoy this player for it's size and ease of carrying in something like a shirt pocket. The included ear buds were fine but, not what I wanted. So they were replaced IMHO just an all round good size, good player.
customer_reviews.author: Cedarkroft

customer_reviews.title: This mp3 player is AWESOME for kids
customer_reviews.text: I love that my little girls (4 & 6) can use this easily to play the same games that they played on my Android smartphone. I installed a child guardian app on it first to keep them from getting on the internet whithout my knowlege; but they ususally just play games on it, take pictures, or listen to their music.
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyKids

customer_reviews.title: Better than an ipod
customer_reviews.text: Love it for my daughter. Much better than the ipod 2nd gen for which we could no longer find games and apps that would work. Even though this galaxy player runs on an older version of android, there are still many many games and apps available. Too bad it's been discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Mary-O

customer_reviews.title: Great MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: This little gem is a great buy! I couldn't believe how clear the images came out from the pictures and video playback on this little player. The sound that comes from this player is unbelievable for its size. Perfect for the pocket and with expandable memory this is a no brainier buy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jms

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this for almost a year now and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have ben looking forever for a mp3 player that has a large capacity and is Bluetooth capable. I do not use my phone for music as that kills the battery. I listen to music everywhere and have more than 20GB of music. I have been using this for almost a year now and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alisida

customer_reviews.title: ~Awesome!~
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mp3 player for my 6 yr old daughter after she received a non-brand 7" tablet for christmas which froze after a month... I'm not a fan of any apple products, so the iPod touch was out of the question... This mp3 player is great!..I received it quick and it was so easy to get started.. III just connected it to Wi-Fi and started downloading songs & games for my daughter.. Now I can keep her entertained while in the car and off if my phone!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Player - Great price
customer_reviews.text: So sad that this great little player is discontinued by Samsung! We were very happy to find it here, even refurbished. It does everything you would want. Was worried about being refurbished, but it works great right out of the box, no problems at all. Connects to wifi, download apps, plays music, games, photos. Only negative is the lack of cases available. It is not the same size as any of the other Samsung products, and the buttons etc are in the wrong spots for similar size cases, so still working on that.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ishii

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my wife several years ago. She needed an easy camera with no phone. She uses it mostly for Pandora with wireless headphones when she wants to block out my snoring and other times as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Santerre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect MP3 for android lovers, who need a device to only put music on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this around a year ago now, and still love it. For internet and taking pictures, its not amazing. definitely interior to any smartphone in the market today. However, I didnt buy it for that. I bought it solely to play music, which is does a great of. I love android, absolutely think its better than apple. Buy this and toss in a 32GB microSD card, youll have all the room for music you need. definitely recommend this to anyone who loves android, but doesn't want to store all their music on their phone.
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly great product. I bought it to replace my Apple iPod because I wanted to have a player that would be easy to put music on. It works great, has some really nice features, looks and feels great. Overall, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: This is a great MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: I was very hestitant when i opened this and it didnt feel like a phone. it feels almost chinzy but it is amazing! does everything my phone does even make calls if you download the right app! my son loves it! and the smaller one is perfect for his little 10yr old hands i would prefer the 4.0 but the 3.6 is not bad at all!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Monoxelos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits in my pocket and holds all my songs with space to spare
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Nelson

customer_reviews.title: it dosen't support google chrome its very slow and has a very poor screen
customer_reviews.text: very outdated! it dosen't support google chrome its very slow and has a very poor screen resolution
customer_reviews.author: charles kohl

customer_reviews.title: lost
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with it I have been looking for a instruction manual with no help nothing simple for an old man not that tech savvy my daughter got me this unit i am lost
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerold man memories ok stop now

customer_reviews.title: very good product. I can see why the discontinuance
customer_reviews.text: very good product. I can see why the discontinuance , however good product I very happy I purchased at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 3.6" Galaxy Plaayer
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what I was ordering. I do not have a cell phone, let alone a smart phone because I do not want a carry along phone. After a week of travelling with the player, I am very impressed with what it does and how well it does it. For such a small device, the book reader is excellent. While stuck in the Sioux Falls airport waiting for a very late plane to chicago, I was able to use the Weather channel to check the weather in Chicago. I have not begun to discover the versatility of the player as delivered, let alone the myriad of apps available.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota29803

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. This is wonderful and reasonably priced. She wanted the one that was really expensive, but this one does everything the other does for a better cost! Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: DWyman

customer_reviews.title: So much better than any iPod!
customer_reviews.text: I've had an iPhone, iPod Touch, iPod Classic and NOTHING compares to this crafty little device. I absolutely adore it! I haven't found anything negative about it and just hate the fact that it has been discontinued and should probably buy a replacement "just in case" now that there are still a few of them around. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sil

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I still use it quite often. The charge could be a little bit longer, but with the screen off and just jamming to tunes, it gets the job done. The headphones that come with it aren't half bad! I use Poweramp(app) to play music, as it can play a wide variety of music formats (FLAC etc...) and with a good SD card, I'm holding 116 full albums with quite a few being FLAC format.. (1319 songs) It's been dropped a few times and has not cracked :)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Not Very User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Not very intuitive but has excellent sound quality and long run time.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: My kiddo loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Early Christmas gift for my boy. He absolutely loves it! Only catch seems to be the less than awesome camera. If it weren't for that I'd give it five stars. Definitely a win!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna M

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 3.6 Galaxy
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it in his car great for storing additional music. It links with radio with easy voice commands for his Ford system.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Williams

customer_reviews.title: miss my galaxy player alot
customer_reviews.text: i love this product so much it only lasted 8months and crash on me and since i've been trying buy a new one
customer_reviews.author: courtneygrate

customer_reviews.title: Great Player!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter bought this and it has been fantastic for her. She mainly wanted an mp3 player and the opportunity to play games too. This has been perfect for her needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I really like it!
customer_reviews.text: I just needed it for music. The sound quality is great, It is also a great mini tablet to. I can get my email and get on Facebook as well. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Dube Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying the music player. It is easy to use, very easy to add my music. I use the Allshare feature to transfer music between my phone and My Sammy (yes, I named it). Love the sound quality and the camera. So far it is an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Darla1350

customer_reviews.title: Mp3 galaxy Player
customer_reviews.text: I am content,since the internet is fast.the touch is precise and fast.8gb memory is great,since comes with it. It motivates me to buy the galaxy 5 cell phone!
customer_reviews.author: David Vidal

customer_reviews.title: iPod beware
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for his birthday. He couldn't be happier with it and it hasn't left his side, save for school, since he got it. It's a great alternative to the iPod and you're not tied down to whatever Apple allows you to have on it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Samsung MP3 Player
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement for a dying Creative Zen MP3 player that I loved. Creative no longer makes anything that I like and the Samsung Galaxy Player seemed to be ( and turned out to definitely be) the best overall value of what I looked at. It does what it's supposed to although it takes forever to "boot" on power-up.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: Use this for Pandora at work- connected to a Bluetooth speaker. Does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Old Guy Rules

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have a lot of money to spend but you want an ipod get it
customer_reviews.text: Prety good it has the android market so most of the $0.99 apps on the app store are free. it has email and free angry birds. I like it but some times it freezes up and I have to take the batery out. I think its because Coffee got spilled on it. it's nice to get an sd card so you have extra memory and there is an app called Gtunes and it lets you download FREE music and the apps free too. Over all a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SERVICES NICE AND FASTER SHIPPING, WE RECOMENT ALLWAYS, FIVE STARS +++++A+A+A+A+A+A+A
customer_reviews.author: Jose Alberto

customer_reviews.title: A nice little player
customer_reviews.text: If you do not need a smart phone but want something like it, this is the device for you. It uses Wi-Fi connection, so you do not need to buy a data pack, it has almost everything the smart phone has, it is a smart phone without a phone.
customer_reviews.author: hf

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 3.6 player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to compliment the Samsung 5.0. Very nice for music. Small enough to carry in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: CV Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: A waste of $80
customer_reviews.text: The product came poorly package, it was not in a box nor did it come with a charger, just a USB cord. It also deleted all the music and video files automatically every other day, and i was not able to return the product. A waste of $80.
customer_reviews.author: fernanda L.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Touch screen does not work properly. Disappointed. Used. Device still had information from a previous owner. I.e photos and files. Play store does not work apps can't be downloaded.
customer_reviews.author: Joe and Cody

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and does so much.  Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: This does all the Ipod Touch does and for way less money. Has access to google play store and thousands of free apps. Music player on this is excellent--great sound and volume level. Even the earbuds that come with it are good. Incredible device for the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: work perfect
customer_reviews.text: got it for the mp3 and being able to download from gtunes to sd card but it has so much more.. all around 5 star
customer_reviews.author: matthew lamagdeleine

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my old mp3 player. It lacks a little on the functionality side for playing music. But it more than makes up for it with all of the other capabilities. Great for those that don't have a smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it, will definitely buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Samsung galaxy player. It does everything an ipod touch does and then some. Plus you don't have to be married to iTunes. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Beth P.

customer_reviews.title: amazing so far...
customer_reviews.text: wow this mp3 player is the best that i have ever owned. sound quality and many extras make it a contender against the ipod touch. only problem i have noticed is that it is supposed to be 8 gb but mine says 4.73? where is the other 4gb? anyone know why this is? weird..... still its not that big of of problem since i can easily upgrade my external sd card up to 32 gb!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: awesome, love it, its been my itty bitty 'lap' top Great price for a product thats like 10 products in one!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Headphone Jack died after only a month. Now these only way it plays is thru Bluetooth...
customer_reviews.author: Kat D.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it was great until it stopped working after 3 months. waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with my Galaxy player
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my Galaxy player! I use it almost every day! Love it!! Received in great time and in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: medicleigh

customer_reviews.title: Mayfly-length lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Shipped promptly and received ahead of schedule. Item looked and worked as described on Amazon page. Downloaded apps, played/downloaded Google Play music, played videos effortlessly. Why 1 stars? Worked for _1 month_ and then irretrievably hardbricked without warning. Profound disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son cannot put it down!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my 12-year old son for Christmas and he loves it. It is practically glued to his hand. It has the same features an ipod. It is very comparable to the ipod. Alot of bang for my buck. I purchased it when it was on sale for $99.99 during black friday week.
customer_reviews.author: Janetia

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Not shipping correct player!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon isn't selling these direct right now except through AMAZON WAREHOUSE DEALS their clearance division. I received my player in the mail in an opened box as described however, this is not the United States player even though I order it from the US site. The instructions appear to be in czech and the power plus is a weird European configuration. THE PLAYER SHIPPED IS NOT MEANT TO BE USED IN THE UNITED STATES. Customer Service could not figure out if this was intentional or a mistake in shipping. Be warned you could receive a foreign player too. The model numbers did not appear to match the advertised listing.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Williams

customer_reviews.title: love this player!
customer_reviews.text: I don't ever want to use another crappy player like ipod!
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: These are good FOR MUSIC ONLY
customer_reviews.text: These are good FOR MUSIC ONLY!! If you are planning to download many apps you'll be disappointed. RAM is not good so you can't run many things at once. However, it does come with excellent earphones which is another reason why it is good only for music.
customer_reviews.author: American Express

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about a month now and have had no trouble with it at all, it runs all the apps I use (Audible, Facebook, Yahoo sports and a few others) flawlessly. It also has a FM tuner which comes in very handy on Game days. The camera isn't very good but I just bought it for playing music and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Molina

customer_reviews.title: Grrrrrrrrrrreat!!!!🐯
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Love this thing. Does everything I need without paying a stupidly high price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Guess

customer_reviews.title: Great Mp3 Player
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new Mp3 player. Its easy to use and slide from window to window. Good sound output as well.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin J. White

customer_reviews.title: good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: It lasted less than a month, but while it worked it worked wonderfully. Next time I think I will just spend the extra to get it brand new rather than refurbished and hopefully, it will last a little bit longer. I only gave it two stars because it lasted less than a month, otherwise I would've given it at least a four.
customer_reviews.author: Britta Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to jump on the "i" whatever bandwagon and stick with droid devices, this is a great alternative. FM Radio is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wallar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my step daughters and they absolutely love them! Good job Samsung! Perfect size and still easily usable!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: battery life sucks, this whole thing had to be replaced within the warranty period and isnt working well again, def wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jenn NB

customer_reviews.title: Got for it, it's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. I'm very satisfied. Long battery life, lasts all day at work. Worth the money. Havn't downloaded any music yet. I just use the wifi, which gets better reception than my iPhone by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Edward yatsko

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: It works just the same as the Galaxy S series phones. Android OS works well with design, and the price is incredible! Expandable memory and removable battery.. Eat your heart out, Apple!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great Player
customer_reviews.text: Great Player. Works well, I use it every day. Player came with the wrong power cable, it was the large Samsung Galaxy Tab type. Easy fix, use a USB cable from cell phone. I'm not sure why Samsung dropped the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan K

customer_reviews.title: Best MP3 Player!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas but love it so much I am going to buy one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Great, Other Reviews Are Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Got this back in early December. It's great and I still use it. I was skeptical on buying this because A LOT of reviews say that this sucks and it barely lasts at all and will break very soon after you buy it. I completely disagree. These people must have been dropping it on a daily basis or playing catch with it or something, cause mine still works perfectly. Highly recommended since it's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Avengers Universe

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, was fast, handled apps so well, suffered from limited software updatability. Crashed often and finally broke after exactly 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Stantonizer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this and loves it. She thinks that it is way better than an ipod and she hasn't had any problems with it. Easy and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: ilovechristianbooks

customer_reviews.title: Better than an iPod touch!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you would expect from a Samsung Galaxy S phone yet only a media player. Bought it for my boyfriend (who has an iPhone.. and don't have the space to download music) He has been won over by Samsung. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Thompson

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: expectations met as described when I ordered this player. easy to use and good sound quality. nice slim design for handling.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The product came quickly, but it took a while to figure out how to use it. The user manual was poor and really didn't even tell me how to begin using it. I eventually figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Burcham

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend this mp3 player. I had to reset it once, but I never lost any of my files.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Mars

customer_reviews.title: Great product - I can make free calls using GrooveIP
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this player and I got it at $99 with free delivery. Downloaded GrooveIP and now I'm making free calls. Free text messages through Google Voice.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

product_meta.title: Samsung 3.6-Inch Galaxy Player (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Freedom just got more fun and portable with the Samsung Galaxy Player WiFi. Easily connect to WiFi hotspots anywhere to get instant access to all of your games, music, videos, and more. And with the Galaxy Player’s Android open platform, the world of apps is a touch away.Formats Supported: Video: AVI, MP4, 3GP, WMV, ASF, MKV, FLV,Audio: MP3, WMA, Ogg, FLAC, AAC, WAV,Photo: JPEG, GIF, BMP, PNG,Text: Word File (doc, docx, xml, txt, rtf, dot, dotx), Excel File (xls, xlsx, csv, xlt, xltx), PowerPoint (ppt, pptx, pot, potx, pps, ppsx), PDF.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



Enjoy music, photos, videos, and more on the go with the Galaxy Player 3.6. This portable media player sports a 3.6-inch screen and built-in Wi-Fi, allowing you to access the web without incurring monthly service fees. Not only does the Galaxy Player give you access to all your favorite music apps and Internet radio stations, but it also features a built-in radio tuner. SoundAlive technology ensures that your music sounds pristine, while the Galaxy Player's drag-and-drop functionality makes it easy to manage your media files. The Galaxy Player offers dual cameras for video chatting or taking photos and it runs on Android 2.3, Gingerbread for optimal performance.








 * Fun on the go
 * Connect and share with your friends
 * Multimedia powerhouse









FUN ON THE GO
ACCESS OVER 450,000 APPS
The Galaxy Player 3.6 gives you access to both Google Play, which has more than 450,000 apps, and Samsung Apps, which offers apps designed just for the Galaxy Player.



Click to enlarge

ONLINE MUSIC LISTENING--WHEREVER YOU ARE
Thanks to built-in Wi-Fi, the Galaxy Player 3.6 lets you enjoy online music wherever you go without any monthly service fees. Enjoy your favorite music apps, Internet radio stations, and more. You can also manage your own digital music library with ease using the Galaxy Player's drag-and-drop functionality and the Kies Air app, which keeps all your multimedia content in one place.

SOUNDALIVE TECHNOLOGY FOR OPTIMAL SOUND
The Galaxy Player 3.6 features SoundAlive, a Samsung audio technology that delivers spacious sound, deep bass, enhanced tone, and exceptional clarity. It also makes automatic adjustments to the sound quality by analyzing the source and customizes sound for movies or music.



CONNECT AND SHARE WITH YOUR FRIENDS
DUAL CAMERAS FOR VIDEO CHAT
The Galaxy Player has a 2 MP rear-facing camera and a VGA front-facing camera. Using a Wi-Fi connection, you can conduct video chats with your friends one-on-one or as a group and instantly share content and images.

BLUETOOTH ENABLED TO USE AS HANDSET
You can use the Galaxy Player's built-in Bluetooth capability to pair it with your phone and use it as an additional handset.



SOCIAL HUB KEEPS YOU IN TOUCH WITH FRIENDS
The Galaxy Player comes installed with Social Hub, a Samsung service that enables you to sync your contacts and calendar events with sites like Google, Yahoo, Windows Live, Facebook, Twitter, and Myspace. Using push technology, the service delivers emails, calendar notifications, and social network updates instantly. As a result, you can stay connected more easily with friends and family members.

MULTIMEDIA POWERHOUSE


ANDROID 2.3, GINGERBREAD FOR FAST PERFORMANCE
The Galaxy Player features a 1 GHz processor and is powered by Android 2.3, Gingerbread for fast performance whether you're browsing the web or enjoying music, photos, or videos.

Adobe Flash compatibility gives you access to more videos, games, and other rich content online. Additionally, you can use the Galaxy Player's microSD card slot to add up to 32GB of additional data storage or easily transfer music and picture files.



Click to enlarge

SHARE VIDEOS AND PHOTOS ON THE BIG SCREEN
Using AllShare--Samsung's content-sharing service--you can play movies, music, and other files from your Galaxy Player 3.6 on any DLNA-compatible TV. Simply connect the Galaxy Player with your TV through the AllShare interface. Share photos from a recent trip on your HDTV or watch your favorite movies at a friend's house.

PRODUCT AND WARRANTY INFORMATION
The Galaxy Player 3.6 measures 4.52 by 2.45 by 0.38 inches (H x W x D) and weighs 0.24 pounds. It is backed by a one-year warranty.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Galaxy Player 3.6, earphones, USB cable, travel charger, battery, and quick start guide.
feature_bullets: Memory Capacity: 8 GB (Expandable with MicroSD Card up to 32 GB)
